description:
Whittel & Melton, LLC, is a full-service Central Florida law practice. Our success and reputation is based on high-quality legal work, performed by well-prepared lawyers who are devoted to their clients. We serve clients in New Port Richey, Dade City, Zephyrhills, Wesley Chapel and throughout the state of Florida.

We focus on three main areas of law:

  • Personal injury: We represent people injured in all types of motor vehicle accidents, slip-and-falls, and other types of accidents.
  • Wrongful death: Our attorneys represent family members who have lost loved ones in fatal accidents caused by another person’s negligence.
  • Criminal defense: Our lawyers defend people charged with crimes ranging from DUI, to domestic violence, to drug possession, to federal conspiracy charges.

Our lawyers include former state of Florida prosecutors, retired military personnel and a retired New York City police officer. Our two founding members, Robert G. Whittel and Jason M. Melton, are former nominees for state and federal office.

Our attorneys are proud to deliver personalized service to our clients. Our clients are more than case files to us. They are our friends and neighbors. We are proud that many of the legal cases we handle are referred to us by clients we have served in the past.

No matter what type of issue you are facing, we offer a free initial consultation to discuss your case. Call 727-847-2299 to schedule a consultation. We offer evening and weekend appointments. Phones are answered 24 hours a day.

We offer nine office locations in Florida, including New Port Richey. Se habla español.
